projects.title: PixaVista
projects.subtitle: Application to get your High Quality wallpaper within a single click.
projects.subtitleTwoLines: Application to get your High Quality wallpaper within a single click. Application to get your High Quality wallpaper within a single click.
projects.description: PixaVista is an Open-Source project which is a simple and clean multi-page portfolio website template for developers. I created this project for developers to quickly build a good-looking and fast-performing multi-page portfolio without having to code their portfolio from scratch.
